data.text: Suzuka…?!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Suzuka…?!

data.text: Haa… haa… a dream…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… a dream…?

data.text:
[Takarazuka Kinen] was coming up soon - Silence Suzuka was 
diligently training in preparation for that grand stage.
data.processed:
<story>[Takarazuka Kinen] was coming up soon - Silence Suzuka was 
<story>diligently training in preparation for that grand stage.

data.text:
Hyaaa~, such amazing speed right from the start! 
As always, Suzuka's running is awesome…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Hyaaa~, such amazing speed right from the start! 
<story>As always, Suzuka's running is awesome…!

data.text:
Something that nobody can replicate, that Uma Musume can only 
call a dream-like run…! I get excited just from watching!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Something that nobody can replicate, that Uma Musume can only 
<story>call a dream-like run…! I get excited just from watching!

data.text: Right at the start, Silence Suzuka surged forward at top speed.
data.processed: <story>Right at the start, Silence Suzuka surged forward at top speed.

data.text:
With speed almost as if the goal was right infront of her, 
even if the goal was still further ahead.
data.processed:
<story>With speed almost as if the goal was right infront of her, 
<story>even if the goal was still further ahead.

data.text:
Normally, around here your speed would start to falter… but in 
Suzuka-san's case, it's just the beginning!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Normally, around here your speed would start to falter… but in 
<story>Suzuka-san's case, it's just the beginning!

data.text:
At that, Silence Suzuka strongly kicked 
at the ground, accelerating.
data.processed:
<story>At that, Silence Suzuka strongly kicked 
<story>at the ground, accelerating.

data.text: Fuwaaa~! She just keeps increasing her speed!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Fuwaaa~! She just keeps increasing her speed!

data.text:
It's almost as if Silence Suzuka is showing that dream-like run 
to excite the fans, the Uma Musume, and even herself.
data.processed:
<story>It's almost as if Silence Suzuka is showing that dream-like run 
<story>to excite the fans, the Uma Musume, and even herself.

data.text:
Every time she runs, Silence Suzuka just keeps improving. 
At this rate, how far will she be able to go?
data.processed:
<story>Every time she runs, Silence Suzuka just keeps improving. 
<story>At this rate, how far will she be able to go?

data.text:
The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. 
It is possible that it might be something outside the 
limits of what an Uma Musume can do.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. 
<story>It is possible that it might be something outside the 
<story>limits of what an Uma Musume can do.

data.text: In that case, at that time her legs…
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed: <story>In that case, at that time her legs…

data.text: Suzuka…?!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Suzuka…?!

data.text: W-what's wrong, Trainer-san?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>W-what's wrong, Trainer-san?

data.text:
Eh… uh. 
No, it's nothing…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Eh… uh. 
<story>No, it's nothing…

data.text:
Eh… uh. 
No, it's nothing…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Eh… uh. 
<story>No, it's nothing…

data.text: Haa… Fuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… Fuu…

data.text:
Welcome back, Suzuka-san! 
You've updated your time again!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Welcome back, Suzuka-san! 
<story>You've updated your time again!

data.text:
Yeah, I could kind of tell while I was running. 
It felt like there was a bit more resistance.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I could kind of tell while I was running. 
<story>It felt like there was a bit more resistance.

data.text:
If it's like this, [Takarazuka Kinen] is a definite win! 
Isn't that right, Trainer-san?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>If it's like this, [Takarazuka Kinen] is a definite win! 
<story>Isn't that right, Trainer-san?

data.text: …Ah, yeah… that's right.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>…Ah, yeah… that's right.

data.text: …Ah, yeah… that's right.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>…Ah, yeah… that's right.

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…?

data.text:
Ever since the day that Agnes Tachyon spoke 
with me, I'd been searching through documents 
regarding other Uma Musumes' injuries.
data.processed:
<story>Ever since the day that Agnes Tachyon spoke 
<story>with me, I'd been searching through documents 
<story>regarding other Uma Musumes' injuries.

data.text:
What conditions were present when they occurred. And when they 
occurred, what kind of situation awaited-
data.processed:
<story>What conditions were present when they occurred. And when they 
<story>occurred, what kind of situation awaited-

data.text:
Even though I was trying to do this to drive away my unease, the 
more and more I investigated, the more my uneasiness grew.
data.processed:
<story>Even though I was trying to do this to drive away my unease, the 
<story>more and more I investigated, the more my uneasiness grew.

data.text:
(Subject 1. Overwhelming Debut victory. 
Highly anticipated second race.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Subject 1. Overwhelming Debut victory. 
<story>Highly anticipated second race.)

data.text:
(With perfect timing, uncharacteristic of a recent Debut, 
rushed forward on the final straight.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(With perfect timing, uncharacteristic of a recent Debut, 
<story>rushed forward on the final straight.)

data.text:
(Next moment, tumbled to the ground. Disqualified. Leg unable to 
endure exerted force. Fracture. - Forced retirement.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Next moment, tumbled to the ground. Disqualified. Leg unable to 
<story>endure exerted force. Fracture. - Forced retirement.)

data.text:
(Subject 2, Senior Class top performer. Attempting 
to extend Consecutive Major victories. Final corner, 
outside, accelerating at high speed.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Subject 2, Senior Class top performer. Attempting 
<story>to extend Consecutive Major victories. Final corner, 
<story>outside, accelerating at high speed.)

data.text:
(Mid-corner, sudden slowdown. 
Unable to continue to goal.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Mid-corner, sudden slowdown. 
<story>Unable to continue to goal.)

data.text: (Disqualified due to injury. - Unable to fully recover…)
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>(Disqualified due to injury. - Unable to fully recover…)

data.text:
(Even after all these other incidents, there are still 
innumerable documents containing these bitter feelings…)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Even after all these other incidents, there are still 
<story>innumerable documents containing these bitter feelings…)

data.text:
(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries 
are an ever-present worry…)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries 
<story>are an ever-present worry…)

data.text:
(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries 
are an ever-present worry…)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries 
<story>are an ever-present worry…)

data.text: Pardon me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Pardon me.

data.text: Suzuka…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Suzuka…?

data.text:
Dinner time had ended at this point, 
but Silence Suzuka came in still dressed in her jersey.
data.processed:
<story>Dinner time had ended at this point, 
<story>but Silence Suzuka came in still dressed in her jersey.

data.text:
She's probably planning to do more independent 
training. To continue polishing her running style… 
to increase her speed even more.
data.processed:
<story>She's probably planning to do more independent 
<story>training. To continue polishing her running style… 
<story>to increase her speed even more.

data.text:
Um, Trainer-san… lately, 
it seems like you've been staying late and working…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Um, Trainer-san… lately, 
<story>it seems like you've been staying late and working…

data.text:
Could it be, there's some kind of problem with my running? 
As things are, will I be unable to win [Takarazuka Kinen]…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Could it be, there's some kind of problem with my running? 
<story>As things are, will I be unable to win [Takarazuka Kinen]…?

data.text:
(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll 
definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's 
more like there's no race you can't win)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll 
<story>definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's 
<story>more like there's no race you can't win)

data.text:
(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll 
definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's 
more like there's no race you can't win)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll 
<story>definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's 
<story>more like there's no race you can't win)

data.text:
(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll 
definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll 
<story>definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)

data.text:
(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll 
definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll 
<story>definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)

data.text: Yes…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes…

data.text: Silence Suzuka cast an anxious glance at me.
data.processed: <story>Silence Suzuka cast an anxious glance at me.

data.text:
To chase her dream, she took the risk of transferring to this 
team, and since she's come here, Silence Suzuka can finally see 
her dream starting to materialize.
data.processed:
<story>To chase her dream, she took the risk of transferring to this 
<story>team, and since she's come here, Silence Suzuka can finally see 
<story>her dream starting to materialize.

data.text:
I shouldn't try to stop this girl so earnestly chasing her dream, 
but my mind is so hazy, I'm unable to even answer her properly.
data.processed:
<story>I shouldn't try to stop this girl so earnestly chasing her dream, 
<story>but my mind is so hazy, I'm unable to even answer her properly.

data.text:
Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That 
aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with 
your legs and body, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That 
<story>aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with 
<story>your legs and body, right?

data.text:
Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That 
aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with 
your legs and body, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That 
<story>aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with 
<story>your legs and body, right?

data.text: Am I pushing myself too hard, is that what you're asking…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Am I pushing myself too hard, is that what you're asking…?

data.text:
If that's the case, I'm fine. 
It's right before a race, after all. I'm being very careful.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>If that's the case, I'm fine. 
<story>It's right before a race, after all. I'm being very careful.

data.text:
On top of that, I'm still feeling very fulfilled. 
There's absolutely nothing that's causing me any worry.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>On top of that, I'm still feeling very fulfilled. 
<story>There's absolutely nothing that's causing me any worry.

data.text: Because, I have-
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Because, I have-

data.text:
Silence Suzuka looked like she wanted to say more. Her expression 
was very soft, and there was no sign of any uneasiness at all.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka looked like she wanted to say more. Her expression 
<story>was very soft, and there was no sign of any uneasiness at all.

data.text:
Nevermind… well then, I'll be off to do some independent 
training. Trainer-san don't push yourself too hard either.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Nevermind… well then, I'll be off to do some independent 
<story>training. Trainer-san don't push yourself too hard either.

data.text:
Trainer-san, at [Takarazuka Kinen], 
let's see that "scenery" together.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, at [Takarazuka Kinen], 
<story>let's see that "scenery" together.

data.text: The "scenery" I'm chasing together with Silence Suzuka-
data.processed: <story>The "scenery" I'm chasing together with Silence Suzuka-

data.text:
[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, 
and what "scenery" will she show me?
data.processed:
<story>[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, 
<story>and what "scenery" will she show me?

data.text:
[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, 
and what "scenery" will she show me?
data.processed:
<story>[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, 
<story>and what "scenery" will she show me?

data.text: Will it be crossing the goal with an amazing time recorded?
data.processed: <story>Will it be crossing the goal with an amazing time recorded?

data.text:
Or will it be the powerful sight of her never giving 
the lead to any of those strong opponents-
data.processed:
<story>Or will it be the powerful sight of her never giving 
<story>the lead to any of those strong opponents-

data.text:
Silence Suzuka runs in the lead! 
Now she's heading around behind the big Zelkova tree!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka runs in the lead! 
<story>Now she's heading around behind the big Zelkova tree!

data.text: (No! That "scenery", I absolutely refuse to let that happen!!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>(No! That "scenery", I absolutely refuse to let that happen!!)

data.text:
(I need to search through even more documents. At the 
very least, identify this premonition, and in the worst 
case, at that time just have her stop-)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I need to search through even more documents. At the 
<story>very least, identify this premonition, and in the worst 
<story>case, at that time just have her stop-)

data.text: Thinking that, I once again glance at those documents but-
data.processed: <story>Thinking that, I once again glance at those documents but-

data.text: Huh…? My vision is…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Huh…? My vision is…

data.text: Huh…? My vision is…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Huh…? My vision is…
